item.title: @elonmusk: President Trump: “You want to have voter ID. You must insist on it. California they don’t have voter...
item.description: President Trump: “You want to have voter ID. You must insist on it. California they don’t have voter ID. If an official asks someone for voter ID, they get thrown in jail.”

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: "You’re seeing 700% increases in illegals in swing states over the last three years. When elec...
item.description: ELON: "You’re seeing 700% increases in illegals in swing states over the last three years. When elections are won by 10,000 votes and you bring in 200,000 people on a fast track to citizenship, there will be no more swing states They’re importing voters. It’s becoming a one-party rule like California and if you have one-party rule, that’s not democracy."

item.title: @elonmusk: Join my conversation with@elonmuskon AGI timelines, energy, robots, and why abundance is the most li...
item.description: Join my conversation with@elonmuskon AGI timelines, energy, robots, and why abundance is the most likely outcome for humanity's future, alongside my Moonshot Mate@DavidBlundin! (00:00) - Navigating the Future of AI and Robotics (04:54) - The Promise of Abundance and Optimism (10:02) - Energy: The Key to a Sustainable Future (15:00) - The Role of Education in a Changing World (41:07) - Health, Longevity, and the Future of Humanity (50:51) - AI's Impact on Labor and Employment (55:05) - Universal High Income: A New Economic Paradigm (57:58) - Navigating the Singularity and AI's Acceleration (01:02:30) - The Role of AI in Healthcare and Surgery (01:08:22) - Ethics and AI: Programming Values into Machines (01:14:18) - The Future of Space Exploration and AI's Role (01:33:30) - The Chip Shortage Crisis (01:42:46) - Simulation Theory and Consciousness (01:48:18) - The Search for Extraterrestrial Life (01:58:28) - The Future of Robotics and AI Integration

item.title: @elonmusk: I don't understand how this hasn't been a thing. It's such a common sense thing to do. If you can't ...
item.description: I don't understand how this hasn't been a thing. It's such a common sense thing to do. If you can't verify someone is a citizen at the time of voting in ALL elections - city, state, federal - what is the point of having a country? I mean seriously lol.

item.title: @elonmusk: "Grokipedia is awesome. It's just phenomenal. I tried to update my Wikipedia page for years and it w...
item.description: "Grokipedia is awesome. It's just phenomenal. I tried to update my Wikipedia page for years and it was impossible. But now Grokipedia knows me." 一 Peter Diamandis
